citation.article-title: Turicibacter sanguinis gen. nov., sp. nov., a novel anaerobic, Gram-positive bacterium.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Turicibacter (Tu.ri.ci.bac'ter; L. neut. n. Turicum the Latin name of Zürich; N.L. masc. n. bacter equivalent of Gr. neut. n. bakterion a small rod; N.L. masc. n. Turicibacter a rod-shaped organism from Zürich, Switzerland, where the bacterium was first isolated)
So far, only one species, the type species Turicibacter sanguinis, has been described.
